title: Lucia di Lammermoor = Lucia of Lammermoor by Donizetti
creator_credit: Official Films, Richfield Operatic Films, George Richfield and E. Cancellieri
brief_description: Donizetti’s tragic opera featuring members of the Scala of Milano and the Opera House of Rome with musical arrangement and script by Raffaele Gervasio and starring Anna Lollobrigida as Lucia.
